mapper.sql: select case when company_name is null then '总计' else company_name end as company_name, case when group_name is null then '小计' else group_name end as group_name, compute_cnt, ok_cnt, err_cnt, offset_cnt, lack_cnt, np_cnt, over_cnt, err_ratio from ( select company_name, group_name, compute_cnt, ok_cnt, err_cnt, offset_cnt, lack_cnt, np_cnt, over_cnt, err_cnt / compute_cnt as err_ratio from ( select company_name, group_name, count(code) as compute_cnt, sum(case when code = 0 then 1 else 0 end) as ok_cnt, sum(case when code != 0 then 1 else 0 end) as err_cnt, sum(case when code = 1 then 1 else 0 end) as offset_cnt, sum(case when code = 2 then 1 else 0 end) as lack_cnt, sum(case when code = 3 then 1 else 0 end) as np_cnt, sum(case when code = 4 then 1 else 0 end) as over_cnt from ( select a.device_id, b.company_name, b.dep_name, b.group_name, a.device_m_id, devicetype, a.devicename, devicenetip, c.pbox_id, machine_no from qtech_eq_ods.ems_t_device a inner join qtech_eq_ods.ems_t_pbox_info c on c.dev_id = a.device_id left join qtech_eq_ods.ems_v_code_name b on a.hierarchy_code = b.hierarchy_show_code left join qtech_eq_ods.ems_t_collector_program d on c.collector_program_id = d.id) ta, ( select sim_id, mc_id, dt, code, description from qtech_eq_dwd.im_wb_olp_chk_result_detail where dt between '2024-01-03 00:00:00' and '2024-01-05 00:00:00') tb where ta.pbox_id = tb.sim_id group by company_name, group_name tc ) td order by case company_name when '古城厂区' then 1 when '台虹厂区' then 2 when '汉浦厂区' then 3 when 'QT_India' then 4 when '总计' then 6 else 5 end asc, case when group_name like '%COB一%' then 1 when group_name like '%COB二%' then 2 when group_name like '%COB三%' then 3 when group_name like '%COB四%' then 4 when group_name like '%COB五%' then 5 when group_name like '%COB六%' then 6 when group_name like '%COB七%' then 7 when group_name like '%COB八%' then 8 when group_name like '%COB九%' then 9 when group_name like '%COB十%' then 10 when group_name like '%光学一%' then 11 when group_name like '%光学二%' then 12 when group_name like '%光学三%' then 13 when group_name like '%光学四%' then 14 when group_name like '%试产一%' then 15 when group_name like '%试产二%' then 16 when group_name like '%试产三%' then 17 when group_name like '小计' then 19 else 18 end asc
mapper.select: select max(dt) as update_time from qtech_eq_dwd.im_wb_olp_chk_result_detail where dt > date_sub(now(), interval 30 day)
